term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - biological exposure index (BEI)
term.title: biological exposure index

item.text: Reference values intended as guidelines for the evaluation of potential health hazards in the practice of industrial hygiene. BEIs represent the levels of determinants that are most likely to be observed in specimens collected from a healthy worker who has been exposed to chemicals to the same extent as a worker with inhalation exposure to the TLV.
